chapters.title: Chapter 14:  Message from the M'Hael
chapters.info: Herid Fel, p. 306 (342)—Late philosopher who worked in Rand's school. He was torn limb from limb by a gholam, or possibly Slayer, for unknown reasons, although it is likely that he'd stumbled upon something quite damaging to the cause of the Shadow if they'd send a gholam or Slayer to do the job. Min is currently reading his book, Reason and Unreason, in an attempt to better understand why he was murdered.
